# Okada Customer Mobile App Mockups

## Overview

The Okada customer mobile app is designed to provide a seamless quick commerce experience for users in Cameroon. The app enables customers to browse products, place orders, and track deliveries in real-time. The design prioritizes simplicity, speed, and reliability, with special consideration for the Cameroonian context including connectivity challenges and payment preferences.

## Key Features

- **Intuitive Navigation**: Simple, straightforward user flow from browsing to checkout
- **Category-Based Browsing**: Easy product discovery through organized categories
- **Real-Time Order Tracking**: Live updates on order status and delivery progress
- **Multiple Payment Options**: Integration with popular mobile money services in Cameroon
- **Offline Functionality**: Core features work even with intermittent connectivity
- **Bilingual Support**: Interface available in both French and English

## Screen Descriptions

### Splash Screen & Onboarding
The entry point to the app featuring the Okada brand identity with a distinctive green background and orange motorcycle icon. The onboarding process introduces key features and value propositions to new users.

### Home Screen
The main product browsing interface featuring:
- Search functionality
- Featured promotions
- Popular categories
- Recently viewed items
- Personalized recommendations based on order history

Payment and delivery options including:
- Delivery address selection and editing

### Order Tracking Screen
![Order Tracking Screen](https://private-us-east-1.manuscdn.com/sessionFile/ChUqmrdIxFhjOjERTlV5Np/sandbox/UZrz6i2Lig4Mfxr9AZTFaM-images_1758909559311_na1fn_L2hvbWUvdWJ1bnR1L29rYWRhX2ZpbmFsX21vY2t1cHMvY3VzdG9tZXJfYXBwL29yZGVyX3RyYWNraW5nX3NjcmVlbg.png?&Key-Pair-Id=K2HSFNDJXOU9YS&Signature=HAigeuPRN1c2roKzlGSpD46cuIOH7hAtk8BqKPUcNQZK~mizJ~hwCxA0cdVTF8Fp9WTj1EkDWg4MEzdU26nQmXnwtfxEcqOWr0-n3UIqq6yv9QjqjRT0VBdBiGnrZPJVAKoqmubnZu~q5tLppjw6sBjboVtqwxG3roEhhHF~7IGsNeLHK~wu4sZiylNm2CNPuBH34wO-yqdQK7jAgSn7o6HYLMs4ZSGlMsNSfoE2~rUajm4ADIkeEsN6bXj9-SXGXQzhOhDUJ55ddtpP4xOLl2VaZtLedQKxamDBOk8dUK4NcdZRFNqi4NEBRsbqnjVmdDGB3Tb7-PAAnuRJK9BpXg__)

Real-time delivery tracking featuring:
- Order status indicators (Order Received, Preparing, On the way, Delivered)
- Map view showing dark store location, customer location, and rider's current position
- Estimated delivery time
- Rider information and contact option
- Order summary

## Design Elements

### Color Palette
- **Primary Green (#1E5631)**: Headers, primary buttons, and brand elements
- **Accent Orange (#FF8C00)**: Call-to-action buttons and highlights
- **White (#FFFFFF)**: Background and content areas
- **Light Gray (#F5F5F5)**: Secondary backgrounds and dividers
- **Dark Gray (#333333)**: Primary text

### Typography
- **Headings**: Sans-serif, bold, 18-24px
- **Body Text**: Sans-serif, regular, 14-16px
- **Button Text**: Sans-serif, medium, 16px

### UI Components
- Rounded corners on cards and buttons (8px radius)
- Subtle shadows for elevation and hierarchy
- Clear visual feedback for interactive elements
- Consistent padding and spacing throughout

## Accessibility Considerations

- High contrast between text and backgrounds
- Touch targets sized appropriately for easy interaction (minimum 44x44px)
- Alternative text for images
- Voice navigation support for users with limited literacy
- Support for system font size adjustments

## Localization

The app is designed to support both French and English languages, with automatic detection based on device settings and manual language selection option in the profile settings.

---

These mockups represent the foundation for the Okada customer app experience, designed specifically for the Cameroonian market context with consideration for local preferences, infrastructure challenges, and cultural nuances.
